name: Paranoia-Really Early Prototype
description:
We are making a horror game where the protagonist is blind and uses echolocation as his main way of sensing whats around him.

-Voice-acting (if you feel like you could do a great job contact us!)

-A immersive story

-Good and fun gameplay and of course  SCARY!

Give us your Feedback on what kinda things we should add,make,delete! Also if you have any cool ideas be sure to Email them to SolarPixelInteractive@gmail.com
